daily_take.headline: Maine Democrats are betting big on Platner to take the Senate seat
daily_take.deck: Graham Platner's odds just jumped 12 points to 79.5%, fueled by $1.1M in volume that suggests real money believes he's the party's pick to challenge the incumbent. Something shifted in Maine Democratic circles this week. The smart read: consolidation around a frontrunner beats a messy primary every time.
